ep-pager-confirm-message-org-many: Ye'r aboot tae delyte thir institutions: $1.
ep-addstudents-instructions:
Type the uisernames o the students that ye want tae eik. Press Enter efter ilcka yin, or clap oan the menu that kiths. Ye can paste ae leet o uisernames ava.

Clap oan "{{int:ep-addstudents-btn}}" whan ye'r dun.
ep-undelete-course-no-rights: This coorse haes been delytit. Ye dinna hae permission fer tae restore it.
ep-undelete-course-org-deleted: This coorse n its institution, [[$1|$2]], hae been delytit. Tae restore this coorse, first [$3 restore $2].
orgpage-delete-text: Ye'r aboot tae delyte the institution $1.
ep-delete-org-no-rights: Ye dinna hae permission tae delyte this institution.
ep-delete-org-has-courses: Ye canna delyte [[$1|$2]] cause thaur ar coorses associated wi it. Please delyte the coorses first.
ep-delete-org-has-courses-plain: Ye canna delyte $1 cause thaur's coorses associatit wi it. Please delyte the coorses first.
